mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER(ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, REG_DT) VALUES(#{id }, #{password }, #{name }, #{email }, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') FROM DUAL))
mapper.select: SELECT ID , PASSWORD , NAME , EMAIL , REG_DT FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{username }
SELECT MR.ROLE_NO FROM TB_MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER_ROLE MR ON M.ID = MR.ID WHERE M.ID = #{username }

SELECT SG.GROUP_ID AS groupId , SG.GROUP_NM AS groupNm , SG.GROUP_FOUNDER AS groupFounder , SG.GROUP_BRIEF AS groupBrief , SG.GROUP_EXPLAIN AS groupExplain , SG.TOTAL AS total , SG.CURRENT_MEMBER AS currentMember , SG.REG_DT AS regDt , M.EMAIL AS email , TGM.ID AS checkJoinId FROM TB_STUDY_GROUP SG LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON SG.GROUP_FOUNDER = M.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ID , GROUP_ID FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER GM WHERE ID = #{suserId } ) TGM ON SG.GROUP_ID = TGM.GROUP_ID ORDER BY SG.REG_DT LIMIT 4
